Use code tags to keep an update log, it saves me the effort of having to scroll down to read the rest of your thread, and it looks neater.

Good luck.

item.title: [hyperion] thugscape
item.dc:creator: @blackflag1 blackflag_
item.description:
@blackflag1 wrote:

[quote=“RevengePK, post:17, topic:517460”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=635718.msg4290408#msg4290408 date=1367113017]

^ this has to be a joke, why in the world would you center your servers name around an lucrative street drug known to make small town white trash hillbillies lose their teeth/get blown up, not to mention your server will be played by many children. Shame, just shame.

why do you care? its his server he should be able to name it what he wants

looks good so far
[/quote]

Oh pardon me if I post negative feedback. I still think the name of the server is idiotic, the name is the reason I didn’t read any of him thread. First impressions are everything when trying to run a business right? Rsps is the same concept. All I’m saying is the name makes you look immature.[/quote]

RevengePK:

Oh pardon me if I post negative feedback. I still think the name of the server is idiotic, the name is the reason I didn’t read any of him thread.

Yes it’s idiotic, but if you read the thread, you would know I started this development for fun! If you are you really going to stop reading a project thread just because you don’t like the name, don’t bother posting feedback u sack of shit

RevengePK:

First impressions are everything when trying to run a business right? Rsps is the same concept. All I’m saying is the name makes you look immature.

once again, this is just a sandbox server/for fun and is not going to be hosted
Unless you are trying to compete with another server then yeah I guess you could say it’s business? it’s not the same concept, I run my servers for fun and never ask for people to donate

always read the thread before posting, especially when giving negative feedback, idiot

Read full topic

item.title: [hyperion] thugscape
item.dc:creator: @blackflag1 blackflag_
item.description:
@blackflag1 wrote:

[quote=“g0d of war1, post:11, topic:517460”]i like the server[quote author=RevengePK link=topic=635718.msg4286556#msg4286556 date=1366422047]

^ this has to be a joke, why in the world would you center your servers name around an lucrative street drug known to make small town white trash hillbillies lose their teeth/get blown up, not to mention your server will be played by many children. Shame, just shame.
[/quote][/quote]

thx, that guy is being a little girl

some updates:
added a functional combat base - only Melee - (still improving a lot), i got the design from Rs2 (2nd time ever attempting making combat by my self)
added special bar for items
added distance checking - checking if the entity is within this amount of blocks from the other entity etc, used for halbers
currently working on special weapons/attacks
going to work on a loader for projectile data for arrows,knives, etc

Read full topic
